item.title: Your Inner Hedgehog
item.description: This paper describes the inner hedgehog, a psychological condition widespread in academia. Published in the Journal of Socio-Experimental Psychology, 2021.

item.title: List of Irregular Verbs Across Romance Languages
item.description: This dataset contains all irregular verbs in known Romance languages.

item.title: Unusual Uses For Olive Oil
item.description:
<!-- ---
##### Download
+ [Paper](paper1.pdf) + [Online appendix](appendix1.pdf) + [Code and data](https://github.com/pmichaillat/feru)
---
##### Abstract
This paper reviews unusual uses for olive oil throughout the Mediterranean world. It highlights in particular the challengs arising from excessive or unorthodox consumption of olive oil. item.title: The Finer Points of Sausage Dogs
item.description: This paper studies the pulmonary efficiency of sausage dogs. Published in the Journal of Canine Science, 2004.

item.title: Lectures at the Villa of Reduced Circumstances
item.description: This graduate course presents classical results in Romance philology.

item.description: This book discusses Portugese irregular verbs in great details.

item.title: Profanity in Early Irish
item.description: This undergraduate course discusses profanity in Early Irish.
